attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This petition calls on the government to intervene in the Royal Mints decision to remove Britannia from the 50p. There are plenty of other coins in circulation that can be used to represent modern Britain, but it is also extremely important to remember our past & our heritage.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
